name: The Lost (itch) (Ben Verschoor)
description:
365 Days Later

The Lost is a digital memorial to the Americans who passed away in the first year of the Coronavirus pandemic. Lasting only a few minutes and consisting only the elements most essential to recognizing over 500,000 people, The Lost has you walking through an abstracted representation of the previous year's emotional trials. It powerfully shows the scope of loss, in a way only a game could.

Requirements

The game can be downloaded for Windows or Mac. It does not require anything special to run on its own, however there are extremely resource-heavy moments that will make even fast systems take a few seconds. Some slowdown is part of the experience, but older systems might have trouble keeping up.
